00288     class by_vehicle_position_sorter {
00289     public:
00294         by_vehicle_position_sorter(const MSLane* const lane)
00295             : myLane(lane) { }
00296 
00297 
00302         by_vehicle_position_sorter(const by_vehicle_position_sorter& s)
00303             : myLane(s.myLane) { }
00304 
00305 
00312         int operator()(const SUMOVehicle* v1, const SUMOVehicle* v2) {
00313             const MSVehicle* const occ = myLane->getPartialOccupator();
00314             if (v1 == occ) {
00315                 return true;
00316             }
00317             if (v2 == occ) {
00318                 return false;
00319             }
00320             return v1->getPositionOnLane() > v2->getPositionOnLane();
00321         }
00322 
00323     private:
00324         by_vehicle_position_sorter& operator=(const by_vehicle_position_sorter&); // just to avoid a compiler warning
00325     private:
00327         const MSLane* const myLane;
00328     };
